title: Blue Essence problem
body: Hello. I complete the achievment and why i got only 250essence and only 1orb.. Others took between 2500 and 10k BE. Guys are you kidding me gave me 250essence please.... is this bug ??

replies.body: Depends on how many runes you purchased at full price..not the 10 ip or 1 ip runes
my friends have the same runes and game gave them 20k essence they are like mine

The BE you got from that mission wasn't random or anything, it was based on how many runes you had previously bought under the old system since they weren't being used any longer. I went ahead and checked to see what all would have been refunded, and it seems you only had 2 tier 3 runes bought so this sounds about right.
